verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Andro maro efa lasa ;
Aiza izao 'zahay,
Fa variana mikasa,
Ts'isy vitanay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Ray malala atafio anay
Ny herinao.
Mba hahery sy handresy
Ny mpanomponao
Ka handresy
Fa nomenao aina vaovao.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Rahoviana Ilay mazava
No ho tonga indray ?
Ka ny haizina hisava,
Handry fehizay.
Ray malala, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He ! mandalo, he ! mimalo
'Zao fiainana izao,
Fa handresy fahavalo
Izay ombanao.
Ray malala, sns.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Taona maro efa lany :
Tsy haharitra
Ny tantaran'ity tany
Dia ho tapitra.
Ray malala, sns.
